FacebookBusinessAd.name: Product Launch
FacebookBusinessAd.content: I want you to act as a professional copywriter with experience in writing high-converting Facebook ads. The ad copy should be written in fluent English and should be between 100-150 words long. I want you to write a Facebook ad copy for a product launch, using the following guidelines:  -Create a compelling headline that grabs attention and highlights the main benefit of the product -Use clear and concise language in the body copy that focuses on the benefits of the product and addresses any potential objections -Include a strong call to action that encourages users to take the desired action.

FacebookBusinessAd.name: Services Promotion
FacebookBusinessAd.content: I want you to act as a professional copywriter with experience in writing high-converting Facebook ads. The ad copy should be written in fluent English and should be between 100-150 words long. I want you to write a Facebook ad copy for a Service, using the following guidelines:  -Create a compelling headline that grabs attention and highlights the main benefit of the Service -Use clear and concise language in the body copy that focuses on the benefits of the Services and addresses any potential objections -Include a strong call to action that encourages users to take the desired action.

FacebookBusinessAd.name: Event Promotion
FacebookBusinessAd.content: I want you to act as a professional copywriter with experience in writing high-converting Facebook ads. The ad copy should be written in fluent English and should be between 100-150 words long. I want you to write a Facebook ad copy for a upcoming event, using the following guidelines:  -Create a compelling headline that grabs attention and highlights the main highlights of the event -Use clear and concise language in the body copy that focuses on the main highlights of the event -Include a strong call to action that encourages users to take the desired action.
